15789.en: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Is that <pc> there?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15789.ja: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「そこにおるのは　<pc>か？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15789.ko: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 넌 <pc> 아니냐?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15789.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>谁在那里？是<pc>吗？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15789.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>在那裡的是<pc>嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15790.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...Hmm. Since you're here, you must be looking into
Spirit Swordsman Ouren, right?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15790.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……フム。ここに来たということは
　さては　お前さん　妖剣士オーレンのことを
　調べておるのじゃな？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15790.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……흠. 여기 온 걸 보니
　요검사 오렌에 대해 조사하고 있는 거로군?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15790.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……哼。你出现在这里
想必是在调查
妖剑士奥连的事吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15790.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……嗯，你既然會來到這裡，
想必是在調查
妖劍士奧連的事吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15791.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...No, say no more. My guess is you're probably here
at Minister Chigri's suggestion.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15791.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……いや　みなまで言うな。
　どうせ　チグリ大臣あたりの差し金であろう。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15791.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……됐다, 일일이 설명할 것 없다.
　보나 마나 치그리 대신이 부탁한 걸 테지.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15791.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……你不必多言。
肯定是奇古力大臣派你来的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15791.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……不，你不必多言。
肯定是奇古力大臣派你來的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15792.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I leave you with a word of advice! I would not speak
ill of Ouren, it's better to leave him as is.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15792.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「お前さんに　忠告しておこう！
　悪いことは言わんから　オーレンのことは
　捨て置くがよい。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15792.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 널 위해 충고 하나 해 주마!
　오렌은 가만히 내버려두거라.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15792.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>给你个忠告吧！
这是为了你好，奥连的事你最好不要再插手了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15792.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>給你個忠告吧！
這是為了你好，奧連的事
你最好不要再插手了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15793.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>You can look into such a thing, but it is a waste
of time. You would never get to the truth. Tell that
to Minister Chigri!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15793.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「そんなもの　調べるだけ　時間のムダ。
　決して　真実には　たどり着けぬ。
　チグリ大臣にも　そう伝えておけ！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15793.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 절대 진실을 밝혀낼 수 없을 터이니
　조사해 봤자 시간낭비일 뿐이다.
　치그리 대신에게도 그리 전하거라!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15793.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>调查这个只是浪费时间而已。
而且你们绝对查不到真相。
把我的话转达给奇古力大臣吧！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15793.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>調查這個只是浪費時間而已。
而且你們絕對查不到真相。
把我的話轉達給奇古力大臣吧！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15794.en:
Danderu rushed out of the room to decipher the
history book!
15794.ja:
ダンデルは　歴史書を解読するため
部屋から　飛びだしていった！
15794.ko:
단델은 역사서를 해독하기 위해
방을 뛰쳐나갔다!
15794.zh-Hans:
丹德尔为了解读历史书，
从房间飞奔了出去。
15794.zh-Hant:
丹德爾為解讀史書，
從房間飛奔了出去。

15795.en: <start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>It would seem that Danderu's request has been fulfilled.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15795.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「どうやら　ダンデルからの依頼を
　果たしてくれたようですな。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15795.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 보아하니 단델의 의뢰를
　해결해 주신 모양이군요.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15795.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>看来，您完成了
丹德尔的委托呢。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15795.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>看來您似乎完成了
丹德爾的委託呢。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15796.en: <start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Then I shall give you your reward. Please accept this.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15796.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「それでは　報酬は　私のほうから
　お渡ししておきましょう。
　どうぞ　これを　受け取ってくだされ。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15796.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 그럼 보상은 제가 건네드리겠습니다.
　자, 이걸 받으십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15796.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>那我就把报酬
给您吧。
请收下。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15796.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>那就由我這邊
將報酬交給您吧。
請收下。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

15797.en:
<pc> told Minister Chigri of
Eidos' warning.
15797.ja:
<pc>は　チグリ大臣に
エイドスからの忠告を伝えた。
15797.zh-Hans:
<pc>向奇古力大臣
转达了艾伊德斯的忠告。
15797.zh-Hant:
<pc>向奇古力大臣
轉達了艾伊德斯的忠告。

15798.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>...What! Master Eidos appeared in before the cave and
said such a thing...<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15798.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「……なんと！　洞くつの前に
　エイドスさまが　現れて　そんなことを……。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15798.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: ……예!? 동굴 앞에 에이도스 님이
　나타나 그런 말씀을 하셨다니…….<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15798.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……什么！艾伊德斯大人在洞窟前出现，
并说了这样的话……<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15798.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……什麼！艾伊德斯大人出現在洞窟前，
並說了這樣的話……<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15799.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Hmm. This is quite inexplicable. What on earth does
Master Eidos know of Ouren...<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15799.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「う～む。じつに　不可解ですな。
　いったい　エイドスさまは　オーレンの
　何を知っているのじゃろうか……。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15799.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 음~ 정말 이해가 안 되는군요.
　대체 에이도스 님은 오렌에 대해
　뭘 알고 계신 건지…….<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15799.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>嗯……真是费解啊。
艾伊德斯大人到底了解奥连的什么事情呢……<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15799.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>嗯……真是費解啊。
艾伊德斯大人到底瞭解奧連的
什麼事情呢……<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15800.ja: <start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「見つかったのデス！！<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15801.en: <start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>I knew it was in volume 47! I've found Ouren's name!<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15801.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「やはり　４７巻でしたっ！
　オーレンの名前を発見したのデス！<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15801.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 역시 47권이 맞았습니다!
　오렌의 이름을 찾았어요!<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15801.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>果然在第４７卷！
发现了奥连的名字！<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15801.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>果然在第４７卷！
發現了奧連的名字！<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15802.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>oOh, well done!
...So, who in the world was Spirit Swordsman Ouren?<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15802.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「おお　でかしたぞ！
　……して　妖剣士オーレンとは
　いったい　何者だったのじゃ？<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15802.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 오오, 잘했네!
　……그래서, 요검사 오렌은
　대체 어떤 인물이던가?<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15802.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>哦！真是大功一件！
那……妖剑士奥连
到底是何方神圣？<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15802.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>喔喔，做得好！
……那麼，妖劍士奧連
到底是何方神聖？<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15803.en: <start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>Oh-ho! Mr. Minister. You've come here, Minister!?<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15803.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「おっほ！　
　これは　大臣サマ。来ておられたのデスか！？<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15803.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 오호!　
　대신님 아니십니까? 와 계셨군요!?<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15803.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>哦！
大臣阁下，您来了吗？<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15803.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>喔！
大臣，您來了嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15804.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>...Ahem! Let me tell you about the life of Spirit
Swordsman Ouren.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15804.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「……オッホン！
　それでは　妖剣士オーレンの半生を
　語らせていただきましょう。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15804.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: ……흠흠!
　그럼 요검사 오렌의 생애에 대해
　설명드리겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15804.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>……咳！
那我就讲述一下妖剑士奥连的生平吧。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15804.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>……咳！
那我就講述一下
妖劍士奧連的生平吧。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15805.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>While alive, he served Glen Castle as a knight was a
hero called Master Swordsman Ouren... That is, until
an incident occurred.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15805.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「生前の彼は　グレン城に仕える騎士であり
　剣聖オーレンと呼ばれる　英雄だったそうデス。
　……そう。ある事件が　起こるまでは。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15805.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 생전, 그자는 그렌성에 소속된 기사로
　검성 오렌이라 불리는 영웅이었다고 합니다.
　……예, 어떤 사건이 일어나기 전까지는요.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15805.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>他生前曾是古莲城的骑士，
是被称为剑圣奥连的英雄。
嗯……直到有个事件发生为止。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15805.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>他生前曾是古蓮城的騎士，
是被稱為劍聖奧連的英雄。
……沒錯，直到某個事件發生為止。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15806.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>On one occasion, Ouren left Glen Castle with his men
on a mission to survey Becon Valley.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15806.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「ある時　オーレンは　ベコン渓谷を
　調査するという任務を負って
　部下を引きつれ　グレン城を出発しました。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15806.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 어느 날, 오렌은 베콘 계곡을
　조사하라는 임무를 수행하기 위해
　부하들을 이끌고 그렌성을 나섰습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15806.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>有一次，
奥连接到调查贝孔峡谷的任务。
于是带着部下从古莲城出发了。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15806.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>有一次，
奧連接下調查貝孔溪谷的任務，
帶著部下從古蓮城出發了。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15807.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>Whereupon he disappeared en route there and next
turned up in Gartlant, at the home of a certain
wealthy merchant.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15807.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「ところが　彼は　その途中で姿をくらまし
　次に　ガートラントの　さる大商人宅に
　姿を現しました。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15807.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 그런데 중간에 행방이 묘연해지더니
　대뜸 가트란트의 한 대상인의 집에
　나타났습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15807.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>但是，他在途中失去了踪影，
后来却出现在加特兰德的一个大商人家里。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15807.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>但是，他在途中失去了蹤影，
後來卻出現在
加特蘭德的一個大商人家裡。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15808.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>And then, unbelievably, Ouren attacked the wealthy
merchant, robbing his possessions, Realm's Chalice,
and the merchant's daughter.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15808.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「そして　信じられないことに　オーレンは
　大商人をおそって　その持ち物であった
　レムルの聖杯と　商人の娘を強奪したのデス。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15808.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 그러고는 놀랍게도 대상인을 공격해
　상인이 갖고 있던 레물의 성배와
　상인의 딸을 데리고 사라졌습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15808.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>令人不可置信的是
奥连袭击了大商人，抢走了雷姆尔的圣杯，
还掳走商人的女儿。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15808.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>令人不可置信的是，
奧連襲擊了大商人，不僅搶走了雷姆爾的聖杯，
還擄走商人的女兒。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15809.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>This incident deteriorated the relationship between
Glen and Gartlant and soon after became the catalyst
for war.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15809.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「この事件は　グレン　ガートラント両国の
　関係を悪化させ　やがて　戦争へと発展する
　引き金となりました。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15809.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 이 사건으로 그렌과 가트란트의
　관계가 틀어졌고
　결국 전쟁이 일어나고 말았지요.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15809.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>这个事件使古莲、加特兰德两国关系恶化，
最终成为了战争的导火线。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15809.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>這個事件使古蓮、加特蘭德兩國關係惡化，
最終成了引發戰爭的
導火線。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15810.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>Henceforth, Ouren was branded a traitor. And for
causing the war, was no longer written in the public
historical record.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15810.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「以来　オーレンは　国を裏切った逆賊。
　戦争を引き起こした大罪人として
　表の歴史では　語られなくなったのデス。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15810.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 그 뒤로 오렌은 나라를 배신한 역적이자
　전쟁을 초래한 대역죄인이 되어
　공식적인 기록에서는 언급이 사라졌습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15810.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>自那以后，奥连就成了叛国贼。
他是引起战争的千古罪人，
所以有关他的历史，书上只字不提。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15810.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>自那以後，奧連就成了叛國賊。
他是引起戰爭的千古罪人，
所以有關他的歷史，書上隻字不提。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15811.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>...Oh my, Spirit Swordsman Ouren was an outrageous
villain. It's no wonder he became a monster.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15811.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「……いやはや　妖剣士オーレンとは
　とんでもない悪党だったのデスな。
　魔物になるのも　うなずける話デス。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15811.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: ……이거 참, 요검사 오렌은
　참으로 악랄한 인물이더군요.
　마물이 된 것도 이해가 됩니다.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15811.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>……哎呀，妖剑士奥连
真是个十恶不赦的坏蛋呢。
这样的人变成怪物，也是可以理解的。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15811.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>……哎呀，妖劍士奧連
真是個十惡不赦的壞蛋呢。
會變成怪物也不難理解。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15812.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Mmm... After hearing this conversation, I feel I am
understanding less and less.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15812.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「むむう……。
　今の話を聞いて　ますます
　わからなくなってきましたわい。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15812.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 으음…….
　그 얘기를 들으니
　더더욱 이해가 안 되는군.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15812.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>嗯……
听了刚才的话
我越来越糊涂了。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15812.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>嗯嗯……
聽了剛才的話，
我越來越搞不清楚了。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15813.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>For what reason would Master Eidos allow such a
villain to do as he pleases...?<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
